subtheme_description: Ensure salary parity with other organizations
Review job classifications and/or reporting levels
Improve communication between executives and staff
Improve and/or expand Leading Workplace Strategies (LWS)
Ensure hiring and promotions are fair and merit based
Focus on Human Resources planning (recruitment, retention, succession)
Make better use of employees' skills and abilities
Provide more and/or better quality recognition
Cultivate effective teamwork and communication within teams
Improve communication between employees and supervisors
Ensure safety and security of employees
Improve facilities (e.g. office space, noise levels, air quality, etc.)
Provide better supplies and equipment (e.g., office supplies, field instruments, printers, etc.)
Provide better office furniture (e.g. desks, chairs, etc.)
Provide better computer-based hardware (e.g., desktops, laptops, etc.)
Assess plans, priorities and strategies for the organization
Improve collaboration between work units or regions
Pay attention to the public interest and service delivery
Review funding or budget allocation to program
